detail_desc: Lined, non-wired bikini top with a cut-out section at the front and narrow shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Shorter blouse in a patterned cotton weave with frill-trimmed smocking at the top and hem and short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves. Opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with taped details and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and a chest pocket.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in sturdy organic cotton jersey with a jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and raw-edge hems.
Shoulder bag in soft, grained imitation leather with rows of fringing, a zip at the top and a narrow, braided shoulder strap. Lined. Size 15x18 cm.
Blouse in an airy weave with a deep V-neck, double-layered panel at the front and gathered yoke at the back. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Ankle-length, tailored trousers in woven fabric with a hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases. Slits at the hems.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Shorter top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and short puff sleeves.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Tunic in an organic cotton weave with a collar, V-shaped opening at the top and a gathered yoke at the back. Gathers on the shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset, lace trims and cutaway coverage at the back.

Lace body with integral push-up bra. The bra is non-wired with moulded, padded, triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with a cut-out section. High cut at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Sleeveless lace top with a small, scalloped stand-up collar, an opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck, and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and loops at the top. Fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles with a low heel.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elastication at the hems.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: One-button satin tuxedo jacket in a cotton blend with a sheen. Shawl collar, chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist, which combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Short, three-strand necklace made up of different metal chains, the longest with a round pendant. Adjustable length, 42-49 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a padded top edge and lacing with speed hooks at the front. Satin linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Derby shoes in imitation suede with a hole pattern, open lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam and braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas and imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Scarf in a soft, airy weave containing some wool with fringing along the short sides.

Shirt in an organic cotton weave with an embroidered motif on the chest and back. Collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Wide, straight-cut top with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Three-strand necklace of various metal chains, two with a pendant. Adjustable length, 40-48.5 cm.
Wide, block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.

Small backpack with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a handle and a large zipped compartment at the top. One outer compartment with a zip and tab. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Width 17 cm. Height 20 cm.

Pyjamas with a short-sleeved nursing top and shorts in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and a wrapover front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Shorts with an elasticated waist panel below the tummy for added comfort.
Balconette bra in lace with lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Long, padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood, stand-up collar and zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Short dress in sequined mesh with a V-neck and wrapover top. Long, slightly wider sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam and satin ribbon at the waist. Jersey lining.
Soft smartphone case in silicone and faux fur with ears at the top and a tail on the front. Fits iPhone 6, 6s and 7.
Bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 7x17x15 cm.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif, contrasting colour hood and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.

Boiler suit in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, flap leg pockets with a button, and patch back pockets. Seam at the waist with wide elastication at the back and wide belt loops, a zip fly and buttons and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gently tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Unlined.
Vest top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the top and an overlocked hem.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short-sleeved jumper in hole-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbed trims around the sleeves and hem.
Top in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neck, short sleeves and an elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist.

Short dress in a soft, airy viscose weave with a small, smocked stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves with a small frill trim, and a seam and flare at the hem.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, fly with a concealed zip, and short, wide legs.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-breasted pea coat in a sturdy weave with side pockets, a tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with a ribbed drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Open jacket in airy, crinkled viscose with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with short sleeves.

Trenchcoat in a crêpe weave with wide notch lapels with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top, loose yoke with a pleat at the back, and a single back vent. Detachable tie belt at the waist, a decorative tab at the cuffs and diagonal welt pockets. Lined.
Top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a cotton blend with an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Chelsea boot-style trainers in printed canvas with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles, rubber soles.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in softly draping viscose jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, V-shaped opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gentle flare to the hem. Rounded hem.
V-neck top in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps.
